channel.title: Run.bat problem any 1 know?
channel.description:
my server was running perfectly until i updated a new home and i got this on the runserver
[code=cpp]exception in thread "main" java.lang.arrayindexoutofboundsexception:8 at NPChandler.loadautospawn(npchandler.java:1967 at NPChandler.(init)(npchandler.java:584 at server.main(server.java:111)[/code]
come on some 1 has to know how to fix :S[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 27, 2009, 09:18:08 pm[/size][hr]any 1 i need this fixed asap,

item.title: Run.bat problem any 1 know?
item.dc:creator: @loggedout loggedout
item.description:
@loggedout wrote:

ahh helixian it works, i dunno why that did that but still thank you for helping

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat problem any 1 know?
item.dc:creator: @Helixian Helixian
item.description:
@Helixian wrote:

youre using someone else’s autospawn.cfg? clean that out, and replace it with the monsters you want in, it will be better. if you use an autospawn.cfg with a different server, your just wasting space, thus more lag.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat problem any 1 know?
item.dc:creator: @loggedout loggedout
item.description:
@loggedout wrote:

ok i tested an old source that runs, i got the auto spawn off that and still the error comes up,
at this point i then decided to copy the client.java into a different source that error still came up
i think it is something to do with the client because all the autospawn.cfg works on a different source
but the client doesnt

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat problem any 1 know?
item.dc:creator: @Gods_army Gods army
item.description:
@Gods_army wrote:

cfg files are wierd like that, say you have spawn = it would give error you need spawn = i think it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat problem any 1 know?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Then you used a space in autospawn.cfg. When editing config files, you need to use tabs instead of spaces. If you don’t, it will throw that in the run.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat problem any 1 know?
item.dc:creator: @loggedout loggedout
item.description:
@loggedout wrote:

i didnt edit anything in NPChandler i only edited global objects, auto spawn and text handler

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat problem any 1 know?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You put a space somewhere in NPCHandler.
Always use tabs.

Read full topic
